item.title: ‘Caught Stealing’ Review: Austin Butler Plays a Relatable Loser in Darren Aronofsky’s High-Energy New York Hustle
item.description: There are two key tests of what makes a movie star. The first is whether the actor in question can carry a movie. That’s something Austin Butler does with an easy, laid-back charm in “Caught Stealing,

item.title: Austin Butler Credits Tom Hardy and Laura Dern for Helping Him Pull Away From Method Acting
item.description: “For a long time, I felt that it had to be a tortured process and I would come out the other side broken,” said the Oscar-nominated actor, who famously went method for ‘Elvis.’

item.title: Austin Butler Credits Tom Hardy and Laura Dern for Helping Him Pull Away From Method Acting
item.description: “For a long time, I felt that it had to be a tortured process and I would come out the other side broken,” said the Oscar-nominated actor, who famously went method for ‘Elvis.’

item.title: Austin Butler Recalls How He “Almost Cracked” a Rib During ‘Caught Stealing’ Fight Scene
item.description: The actor says director Darren Aronofsky “put me through the ringer on this film.”

item.title: Austin Butler Says an Edible Is the Reason for His Awkward Dancing at Bad Bunny Concert
item.description: Butler and Bad Bunny co-star in Darren Aronofsky’s new film, ‘Caught Stealing.’
